smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FCMService.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of UserListAdapter.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (diceModus == 1 && diceModusPrev == 4) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: diceModus == 1 && diceModusPrev == 4
Parentheses in (!isDouble1 && diceModus == 1 && flipModus == 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !isDouble1 && diceModus == 1 && flipModus == 1
Parentheses in (System.currentTimeMillis() - timestamp) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: System.currentTimeMillis() - timestamp
Parentheses in (timeMilSec / (1000 * 60) % 60) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: timeMilSec / (1000 * 60) % 60
Parentheses in (timeMilSec / (1000 * 60 * 60) % 24) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: timeMilSec / (1000 * 60 * 60) % 24
Parentheses in (timeMilSec / (1000 * 60 * 60) / 24) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: timeMilSec / (1000 * 60 * 60) / 24
Parentheses in (diceState == 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: diceState == 1
Parentheses in (widthMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: widthMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY
Parentheses in (widthMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: widthMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST
Parentheses in (heightMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: heightMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY
Parentheses in (heightMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: heightMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST
Parentheses in (activity.nextSavePosition + 1) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: activity.nextSavePosition + 1
Parentheses in (widthMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: widthMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY
Parentheses in (widthMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: widthMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST
Parentheses in (heightMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: heightMode == MeasureSpec.EXACTLY
Parentheses in (heightMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: heightMode == MeasureSpec.AT_MOST

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.
